data.title: Sean Penn's Second Ex-Wife Robin Wright Caught Swapping Spit With 37-Year-Old Husband On Beach Amid Actor's Third Divorce
data.text:
Getting your Trinity Audio player ready...

Robin Wright could care less if her ex-husband Sean Penn is going through his third divorce â€” because she's playing tonsil hockey with her much-younger hubby, Clement Giraudet.

Article continues below advertisement

The 55-year-old actress barely came up for air and was caught locking lips with her 37-year-old man at a Los Angeles beach on Sunday.

Article continues below advertisement

Climbing on top of Clement as if no one was watching, Wright didn't appear to care if the paparazzi captured her in action.

Article continues below advertisement

Wearing a camouflage baseball cap, black sweater, and a pair of jeans, Penn's second ex-wife looked infatuated with her tattooed husband of three years.

Article continues below advertisement

Appearing completely unbothered by Penn's personal troubles, Wright managed to pull herself off Clement following their PDA-filled romp in the sand.

Article continues below advertisement

See the photos here!

Article continues below advertisement

MORE ON:

Robin Wright

Sean Penn Stressed & Smoking, Still Wearing Wedding Ring In First Sighting Since Third Wife Leila George Filed For Divorce

Reunited: Sean Penn & Ex-Wife Robin Wright Spotted At LAX Again After Rumored Trip Together 13 Years Post-Divorce

Back On? Exes Sean Penn & Robin Wright Spotted Together Weeks After Finalizing Their Separate Divorces

Article continues below advertisement

Penn's third wife pulled the plug on their marriage just two days before Wright's makeout session.

Article continues below advertisement

The I Am Sam actor married Leila George in July 2020. According to reports, she filed for divorce in Los Angeles County Superior Court on Friday after just one year of marriage.

Article continues below advertisement

The Australian-born actress is no stranger to the limelight. Her father is Emmy-nominated actor Vincent D'Onofrio.

Article continues below advertisement

Article continues below advertisement

Penn and Leila tied the knot in an intimate wedding at their home during the Covid-19 pandemic. They were spotted just two months ago walking through a parking lot holding hands.

Article continues below advertisement

The duo began dating in 2016 and have no children together. It's not clear what caused Leila to pull the plug on her marriage to Penn.

Article continues below advertisement

Leila was Penn's third wife. Before he walked down the aisle with her, he was married to Wright and Madonna.

Wright was his second marriage. The two wed in 1996 and ended their marriage in 2010. Penn was famously married to Madonna from 1985-1989.
